nodes.text: Star Wars Storybook Collection: Star Wars: The Prequel Trilogy Stories and Star Wars: The Original Trilogy Stories

Star Wars Storybook Collection: Star Wars: The Prequel Trilogy Stories and Star Wars: The Original Trilogy Stories is the unabridged audio version of the canon young-reader books The Prequel Trilogy Stories and The Original Trilogy Stories, written by various authors. The audiobook was performed by Bradford Hastings and was released by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on March 19, 2019.
